Body:
environment = 'xanadu'
pub = PagerDutyPublisher('url here', 'token', environment=environment)
message = pub._construct_message(Failure('ternary computers not supported!',
    Validation('bit frobnication validation', priority=Priority.CRITICAL),
    'unable to frobnicate bits!'))
assert message.startswith('Failure in %s:' % environment)
